615170.name: Fantasy Grounds - NPCs: The Poor (Token Pack)
615170.description:
NPCs: The Poor

This token pack contains 43 tokens. This pack contains non player characters of low standing found in a typical town.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 2 Female Barmaids
  • 2 Female and one Male Beggar
  • Male and Female Elderly
  • Male and Female Farmer
  • Female Message Bearer
  • Female Poor Carrier
  • Female Poor Cloaked
  • Female Poor Dog Sitter
  • Female Poor Net Mender
  • Female Poor Shepherd
  • 2 Female Poor Sleeping
  • Female Poor Washer
  • Female Poster Maker
  • Female Sitting Beggar
  • Female Sitting Washer
  • Male Baker
  • Male Cook
  • Male Digger
  • 3 Male Dock Workers
  • 2 Male Fishers
  • Male Foreman
  • Male Hauler
  • Male Miner
  • 2 Male Poor Merchant2
  • 2 Male Poor Sleeing
  • Male Sitting
  • Male Sitting Beggar
  • 2 Male Travelers
  • 2 Male Woodchopper
  • Token Info Card
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
